description.@en: I’ve seen the great baleen off the coasts, slaughtered man-eating walruses and fought against the leviathan of the Atlantic.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Threats who are Large Sized or Huge Sized only reference 1D6 Fury Die due to their Size to deal Damage to you (as opposed to their normal number of Fury Dice).
